snippet: Sightseeing doesn’t always have to wait until you reach your destination. Consider the historic city of Narita, Japan.
lead_paragraph: Sightseeing doesn’t always have to wait until you reach your destination. Consider the historic city of Narita, Japan.

headline.main: In Asia, Layovers That Let You Take in the Sights
